group_1.textRight: Working at a cafe...?

group_1.textLeft: Yep, that's right!
Yesterday, I found a shop that resembled@the cafe we used to go to a lot.
It felt nostalgic, and I was peeking inside@when a lady talked to me.
So, it turns out she's the owner there,@and the conversation just flowed smoothly!

group_1.textRight: ...Isn't that suspicious?

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* You worry too much.
If it were a man, even I would've been scared,
but it wasn't like that.@Besides, it's just a regular cafe, you know?
I can't imagine they'd make me do anything shady.@It'll be okay.

group_1.textRight: Hmm...

group_1.textLeft: If you're that worried, wanna come with me?
I'd be really happy if I could work there with you!

group_1.textRight: Nah...it's a bit much to demand@for me to work as well.
...So, I'll pass.

group_1.textLeft: I see...that's a shame.

group_1.textRight: Instead, I'll come as a customer@to see your workplace.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:114403:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Really?!@Yay, that makes me happy!

group_1.textRight: Actually, I wanted you to take it easy and relax.

group_1.textLeft: It's okay, it's okay!@I'll work hard and treat you, Hanna!

group_1.textRight: I see...
...Well...don't overdo it, okay?

group_1.narration: And so, I ended up helping out at the cafe.
Inside the shop, a quiet atmosphere prevailed.@Customers seeking calmness and tranquility come in,@and I offer warm hot coffee to those tired of the noise...
...Well, that was what I was imagining.

group_1.textRight: Waitress, more coffee here!

group_1.textLeft: The coffee here hasn't arrived yet.

group_1.textRight: Here we want the specialty, the fruit punch!
Sorry, I have some customer-related@business to attend to, so you're on your own.

group_1.textLeft: M-my pleasure...!

group_1.textCenter: I-I've brought the coffee you ordered...!

group_1.textLeft: Oh my, it really did arrive.

group_1.textRight: I told you, they really opened a cafe.

group_1.textLeft: I couldn't figure out what they were doing before...
Well, I feel safer if it's from a cafe.@Keep up the good work.

group_1.textCenter: It's not quite what I expected...!

group_1.narration: Ah, it's so busy... I'm getting dizzy...@Is a cafe always this busy...?@And why am I alone on my first day...?
The owner often goes to the back room with a customer@and doesn't help with the shop at all.
She probably wants me to do all the work@while she relaxes... How awful...
But...is it really awful?@Maybe that's how business owners are...@After all, she doesn't even know who I am,@and she is so generous to me.@I should work without complaining...

group_1.textRight: Waitress! This coffee is too light!

group_1.narration: Eh...? Eeeh~...@There's a concept of light and heavy coffee...?!@I didn't know that...it's my first day after all...@Just being able to make coffee is amazing...

group_1.textRight: Se-Sena...

group_1.textLeft: Ah, it's so busy, I'm starting to hallucinate...
Hehe...but it's okay if it's a hallucination.@Hanna, I'm tired, can I lean on you?

group_1.textRight: No...it's not a hallucination.@Didn't I tell you that I would visit you?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, wait...@You are the real Hanna?!
Oh no! I'll clean this place up right away!@I'll get you some black coffee too!

group_1.textRight: ...No, it's fine.
Wait, you say the coffee is too weak?@That's the taste here.
If you don't like it, go somewhere else.
So, would you like another one?@Or anything else?
And there are two more orders to deliver.@I'll go for those.

group_1.textLeft: Are you helping me...?

group_1.textRight: If Sena's in trouble, I can't just ignore it.

group_1.textLeft: Ha-Hanna...!

group_1.textRight: Okay, I'll be going now.

group_1.textLeft: Thanks! I'll make a hot cup of black coffee@and wait for you!

group_1.textRight: ...I'll be right back.

group_1.textCenter: Alright... I need to wash the dishes now!

group_1.narration: Thanks to Hanna coming, I've got my energy back...@I can work even harder.
...I really can't do anything without her...@I just realized the obvious.
